languages.text: "Нет горя в том, чтобы ступить на нить служения Ему рано. Горе — ступить на нее слишком поздно. Не жалей меня".
"There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."
languages.original_text: "Нет горя в том, чтобы ступить на нить служения Ему рано. Горе — ступить на нее слишком поздно. Не жалей меня".

traits.locale_text: "There is no grief in stepping onto the thread of His service early. One should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."
"There is no grief in stepping onto the thread of His service early. One should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."
"There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."
"There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."
"There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."
"There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."
"There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."

languages.text: "Es liegt keine Trauer darin, frühzeitig auf den Faden des Dienstes am Imperator zu treten. Eher sollte man klagen, wenn dies zu spät geschieht. Ihr müsst mich nicht bemitleiden."
languages.original_text: "There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."

traits.locale_text: "Es liegt keine Trauer darin, frühzeitig auf den Faden des Dienstes am Imperator zu treten. Eher sollte man klagen, wenn dies zu spät geschieht. Ihr müsst mich nicht bemitleiden."

languages.text: « Il n'y a pas de mal à s'engager dès le plus jeune âge sur le fil de Son service. Au contraire, il y a tout lieu de s'en réjouir. Rassurez-vous, je n'ai pas à me plaindre. »
languages.original_text: "There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a pas de mal à s'engager dès le plus jeune âge sur le fil de Son service. Au contraire, il y a tout lieu de s'en réjouir. Rassurez-vous, je n'ai pas à me plaindre. »

languages.text: «No hay pesar en entrar pronto a Su servicio. Lo lamentable sería entrar demasiado tarde. No sienta lástima por mí».
languages.original_text: "There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."

traits.locale_text: «No hay pesar en entrar pronto a Su servicio. Lo lamentable sería entrar demasiado tarde. No sienta lástima por mí».

languages.text: 「主の奉仕の糸に早く足を踏み入れることに悲しみはない。むしろ、遅すぎたことを嘆くべきだ。私を気の毒に思わないでくれ」
languages.original_text: "There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."

traits.locale_text: 「主の奉仕の糸に早く足を踏み入れることに悲しみはない。むしろ、遅すぎたことを嘆くべきだ。私を気の毒に思わないでくれ」

languages.text: “早早地踏上了侍奉祂的道路，这并没有什么可悲伤的。相反，若是觉悟得太晚，那才值得哀叹。无须为我感到难过。”
languages.original_text: "There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."

traits.locale_text: “早早地踏上了侍奉祂的道路，这并没有什么可悲伤的。相反，若是觉悟得太晚，那才值得哀叹。无须为我感到难过。”

languages.original_text: "There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."

languages.text: "O'nun hizmetine uzanan ipliğe erkenden adım atmada hüzünlenmeye yer yoktur. Aksine kişi, bu denli geç kaldığı için yakınmalıdır. Benim için üzülme."
languages.original_text: "There is no sorrow in stepping onto the thread of His service early. Rather, one should lament doing so too late. Do not feel sorry for me."
